description: This file defines the DashboardScreen widget for a Flutter app, representing the user dashboard UI, including layout, styling, and components such as cards, top bar, and navigation drawer.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main dashboard screen with various UI components.

methods.name: _card
methods.description: A helper method to create a styled info card with icon, title, and subtitle.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the dashboard screen, including app bar, drawer, and body content.
